messages.message:
Hey team! I have a favor to ask:
Cypress CI failures can be tricky to diagnose (and frustrating). While we’re continuing to improve it, I’d like to try a small experiment:

I’ve set up a sheet to track all force-merge requests caused by Cypress CI blocking PR merges:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FRnWtHzP32UV6Xgxvm0bJ522UkphGYrtTSVa5Fj49zI/edit?gid=0#gid=0

Whenever you request a force-merge, please also log it in the spreadsheet.

We’ll review the data in a week or two and decide if it makes sense to switch back to non-blocking.
Tagging managers @Serena @Anil @Yash Botadra @Hari  , let me know if there is anyone I missed
